name: Meowtica Smart Hub
description: The central control unit for your Meowtica smart home ecosystem. Connect all your smart devices into one seamless network with our flagship Smart Hub.

name: Purr Motion Sensor
description: Detect movement in your home with cat-like reflexes using our Purr Motion Sensor. Features pet-friendly detection to reduce false alarms.

name: Whisker Smart Thermostat
description: Maintain perfect temperature with intelligent climate control using our Whisker Smart Thermostat.

name: Meowtica Security Camera
description: Keep an eye on your home with crystal clear 1080p HD video and advanced night vision.

name: Paw Print Smart Lock
description: Upgrade your home security with the Paw Print Smart Lock, featuring fingerprint recognition, PIN code entry, and remote smartphone access.

name: Nightlight Smart Bulbs (4-Pack)
description: Transform your home lighting with Nightlight Smart Bulbs, offering 16 million colors and dimmable white light options.

name: PurrFect Water Sensor
description: Protect your home from water damage with the PurrFect Water Sensor. Detects leaks and moisture with immediate alerts.

name: Meowtica Smart Doorbell
description: Never miss a visitor with the Meowtica Smart Doorbell. Features HD video, motion detection, and two-way audio.

name: WhiskerSwitch Smart Plugs (2-Pack)
description: Transform any appliance into a smart device with WhiskerSwitch Smart Plugs.

name: Smart Coffee Maker
description: Transform your morning routine with our Smart Coffee Maker. Features remote brewing via smartphone app, customizable schedules, and multiple brew strength options.

name: Smart Vacuum
description: Keep your home clean with intelligent navigation and powerful suction. Features room mapping, automatic recharging, and app control.

name: Meowtica Track Collar
description: Keep track of your beloved pets with real-time GPS location tracking, geofencing with custom safe zones, and activity monitoring.

name: Paws Mini Smart Hub
description: The perfect entry-level smart home controller in a compact size.

name: Smart Robot Mop
description: Keep your floors spotless with advanced LiDAR mapping, precision water flow control, and multiple cleaning modes.

name: Purr Temperature Sensor
description: Monitor precise temperature and humidity levels throughout your home.

name: Meowtica Outdoor Camera
description: Protect your property's perimeter with the Meowtica Outdoor Camera, featuring 2K HDR video.

name: WhiskerNet Pro Hub
description: Take your smart home to the next level with enhanced wireless range, Thread and Matter compatibility, and support for up to 200 devices.

name: WhiskerSense Ceiling Fan Controller
description: Transform your ordinary ceiling fan into a smart climate control device with app control and automation.

name: NightGlow Smart Light Strip
description: Add ambiance and accent lighting to any space with the flexible NightGlow Smart Light Strip.

name: Whisker Ceiling Light
description: Replace your standard ceiling fixture with the Whisker Ceiling Light for smart illumination.

name: PurrFect Climate Monitor
description: Track and optimize environmental conditions throughout your home with wireless satellite sensors for multiple rooms.

name: WhiskerControl Smart Power Strip
description: Upgrade your workspace or entertainment center with individually controllable outlets.

name: PurrFect Outdoor Smart Plug
description: Extend your smart home to the outdoors with this weatherproof dual outlet smart plug.

name: Whisker Mini Smart Plug
description: The most compact smart plug in our lineup, designed to fit into tight spaces.
